articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Adobe Animate is shutting down as company focuses on AI - TechCrunch
articles.description: Adobe Animate will be discontinued on March 1, 2026, as Adobe shifts its focus to AI.
articles.content: As Adobe rampsupitsinvestments in AI, the company has decided to shut down its 2D animation software, Adobe Animate. On Monday, Adobe issued an update to the company’s support site and sent emails to… [+2573 chars]
